descriptions.description: LAME is an educational tool to be used for learning about MP3 encoding. The goal of the LAME project is to improve the psycho acoustics, quality and speed of MP3 encoding.

set.commands: PACKAGE_NAME=lame PACKAGE_VERSION=3.99.5 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
